Title: Day of the Falcon
Writer: Menno Meyjes (screenplay), Jean-Jacques Annaud (adaptation), Alain Godard (adaptation), Hans Ruesch (novel)
Actors: Tahar Rahim, Antonio Banderas, Mark Strong, Freida Pinto
Plot: Set in the 1930s Arab states at the dawn of the oil boom, the story centers on a young Arab prince torn between allegiance to his conservative father and modern, liberal father-in-law.
